name: withering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A withering look, remark, etc. is one that is intended to make someone feel ashamed: He said that Lizzie had been drunk at the time and I saw her shoot him a withering glance.
severe and extremely critical: He made a withering attack on government policy.
